nodes.text: Keaton Murag was a Jedi Master who sat on the Jedi High Council during the High Republic Era. When the Jedi Council convened to decide whether to participate in action against the Nihil marauder group alongside the Galactic Republic, Murag was present in the Jedi Council Chamber personally. After ten of the eleven attending Masters voted, the vote was left with a tie, leaving Master Jora Malli to break it. Malli decided to accompany the Republic Defense Coalition effort against the Nihil.
